msg: Reverse out additional linkage argument from DECLARE_HOOK

msg: Reverse out all _EXPORT_VAR changes back to their original _VAR_EXPORT

author: wrowe
msg: Cleanup MSVC .dsp build for support/ files.  Give all support/ .dsp's
the GCD configuration.  The entire Win32 environment now builds, but
I'm sure that will be fixed soon :-)

author: wrowe
msg: Prevent the .dsp project files from being touched if they were
already cleanly converted.  Note that just loading the 6.0 .dsp
in the 5.0 MSVC environment doesn't toggle the /ZI->/Zi option.
